message: Not entirely. My book covers concurrency in general, including parallelism (i.e., Parallel.For / Parallel LINQ), asynchrony (async/await), dataflow (TPL Dataflow), and reactive programming (Rx). So there's a lot of topics that aren't covered by my blog. But on the other hand, I go into a lot more detail re asynchrony on my blog that I don't have in my book.
